altTitle: The Alchemist Who Survived Now Dreams of a Quiet City Life
生き残り錬金術師は街で静かに暮らしたい
The Last Alchemist Dreams of a Quiet Town Life
The survived alchemist with a dream of a quiet town life.

title: Ikinokori Renkinjutsushi wa Machi de Shizuka ni Kurashitai
